results.name: Aliquot sequence starting at 1074.
reference: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, B6.
link: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..881
Index entries for sequences related to aliquot parts.
program: (PARI) a(n, a=1074)={for(i=1, n, a=sigma(a)-a); a} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 24 2018
xref: Cf. A098007 (length of aliquot sequences). Some other examples: A008885 (starting at 30) .. A008892 (starting at 276), A014360 (starting at 552) .. A014365 (starting at 1134), ..., A171103 (starting at 46758). See link to index for a more complete list.
